sentences.english: PLA Navy to conduct live-ammunition drill in Yellow Sea.
sentences.chinese: 中國人民解放軍海軍在黃海進行實彈演習。

sentences.english: Lampetra japonica could migrate to the Yellow Sea region and freshwater in Jiangsu Province.
sentences.chinese: 日本七鰓鰻可以遷移到黃海及江蘇省淡水中。

sentences.english: Yellow Sea coastal waters of the thermocline is the strongest and weakest areas halocline.
sentences.chinese: 黃海是中國近海溫躍層最強而鹽躍層最弱的區域。

sentences.english: Hai Qing and Huang Haibo will bring us a short sketch.
sentences.chinese: 海清和黃海波會給我們帶來一個小品。

sentences.english: It stands in the Yellow Sea lake, tall and majestic.
sentences.chinese: 它聳立在黃海之濱，高大雄偉。

sentences.english: China is bounded on the east by the Yellow Sea.
The appearance of Cold Water Mass induces a large-scale cyclone circulation in the center of the Yellow Sea.
sentences.chinese: 冷水團的出現使得黃海中部產生一個大範圍氣旋環流。

sentences.english: The Lower Yangtze Region consists of the rigid nuclear area of the South Yellow Seaand the cratonic peripheral belt.
sentences.chinese: 下揚子區由南黃海剛性陸核及其克拉通周邊地帶組成。

sentences.english: The ice conditions in the Bohai Sea and the northern Huanghai Sea greatly change from year to year with winter climate.
sentences.chinese: 渤海和北黃海的冰情隨着歷年冬季氣候差異而不同。

sentences.english: East China fishery hit by worst sea ice in 40 yrs.
sentences.chinese: 中國東部黃海渤海遭遇40年來最揚中冰凍。

sentences.english: There was a decreasing tendency in species diversity from the northern to the southern areas.
sentences.chinese: 黃海漁業生物多樣性由北向南遞減。

sentences.english: In addition, South Cold Water Mass promote develope of the suspended-cline and lower turbid water.
sentences.chinese: 南黃海冷水團促進了渾水層和懸浮體躍層的發育。

sentences.english: As mentioned above, the fish nematodes from Yellow Sea has a low species richness.
sentences.chinese: 異尖科宮脂屬線蟲爲黃海魚類線蟲的優勢種羣。

sentences.english: The chlamys farreri was provided by the Yellow Sea Fisheries Research Institute, Chinese Academy of Fishery Sciences.
sentences.chinese: 扇貝多肽由中國水產科學院黃海水產研究所提供。

sentences.english: The Yellow Sea Battle is regarded as the beginning of the Jiawu Sino-Japanese War.
sentences.chinese: 黃海大戰被認爲是中日甲午戰爭開端。

sentences.english: Paleozoic to Quaternary sediments well developed in the Southern Yellow Sea.
sentences.chinese: 南黃海地區發育古生界第四系沉積。

definition: lit. ten thousand stampeding horses (idiom)/fig. with great momentum/going full speed ahead
Yandang mountains, famous scenic area in southeast Zhejiang
